fields.name: Home alone
fields.description: Home Alone is a comedy film written and produced by John Hughes and directed by Chris Columbus

fields.name: War and peace
fields.description: War and peace is a novel by the Russian author Leo Tolstoy.

fields.name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
fields.description: It is comedy film written and produced by John Hughes and directed by Chris Columbus. It is the second film in the Home Alone series and the sequel to the 1990 film Home Alone
